headline: Tracking the Evolving Narrative for Monolithic Power Systems After Fresh AI Fueled Optimism
summary: Monolithic Power Systems has seen its price target nudged higher as analysts grow more confident that secular DC and AI demand can support faster earnings compounding than previously modeled, even while core valuation inputs remain broadly steady. With the discount rate only slightly higher and revenue growth assumptions effectively unchanged, the latest revisions reflect a clearer multiyear earnings path underpinned by product ramps and share gains at key AI customers. Read on to see how...

headline: Truist Announces New $10B Common Stock Repurchase Program
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced that its Board of Directors has authorized a new share-repurchase program of up to $10 billion of the company's outstanding common stock. The authorization is effective immediately and does not have an expiration date.

headline: Broadcom (AVGO) Target Jumped at Truist as AI Growth Story Stays Intact
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) is included among the 15 Best Blue-Chip Stocks with Growing Dividends. Truist lifted its price target on Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) to $500 from $365 and kept a Buy rating on the stock. The firm said the latest quarter came in as a “pretty low-drama” earnings beat with higher guidance. While there is […]

headline: Costco (COST) Target Lowered at Truist on Valuation Concerns
summary: Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) is included among the 15 Best Blue-Chip Stocks with Growing Dividends. On December 12, Truist analyst Scot Ciccarelli cut Costco Wholesale Corporation (NASDAQ:COST) price target to $926 from $1,033 and kept a Hold rating. He noted the company had another solid quarter, with US comps up 5.9% and enterprise comps up […]

headline: Looking at the Narrative for PNC After Analyst Upgrades and Expansion Moves
summary: PNC Financial Services Group stock has seen its fair value estimate nudge higher from about $220.55 to roughly $220.93, as analysts grow slightly more optimistic on the bank's long term earnings potential. This subtle shift reflects a mix of incrementally stronger revenue growth expectations and a small reduction in the discount rate, anchored in improving sentiment around industry tailwinds, capital deployment, and fee income trends. Stay tuned to see how you can track these evolving price...
